'''18w20a''' is the thirty-fifth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.13]], released on May 15, 2018<ref>{{snap|18w20a|id=b|May 15, 2018}}</ref>.

== Additions ==
'''Command format'''
* Teams can now have a prefix and a suffix, specified as [[Raw JSON text format|raw JSON text]].
** {{command|team option <team> prefix <prefix>}}
** {{command|team option <team> suffix <suffix>}}

=== Non-mob entities ===
* Changed the name of [[lightning bolt]]:
{| class="wikitable" data-description="Changed Lightning Bolt name"
! Old name !! New name
|-
| <code>Bolt of Lightning</code> || <code>Lightning Bolt</code>
|}

=== General ===
* Players in Creative mode can now sleep even if monsters are nearby.
* Many internal IDs and data values have been changed, such as [[texture]] and [[structure]] files.
